'''Gentry of Hermitage''' is a [[Character Event Wish-2]] in [[Version 3.0]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2022-08-24 11:00:00 UTC+8 &ndash; 2022-09-09 17:59:59

===Summary===
* During the event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Vago Mundo" [[Zhongli]] ({{Geo}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the four-star characters "Sprout of Rebirth" [[Collei]] ({{Dendro}}), "Kätzlein Cocktail" [[Diona]] ({{Cryo}}), and "Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" [[Fischl]] ({{Electro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
